item.title: Rcpp and RcppArmaillo usefull tips
item.description: Rcpp The Rcpp package provides C++ classes that greatly facilitate interfacing C or C++ code in R packages using the .Call() interface provided by R. The website of the author: Dirk Eddelbuettela Configuration: Install C++ compiler For windows user, Install Rtools. Reference Some useful reference Rcpp for everyone Rcpp website Adanced R, High performance functions with Rcpp Using Rcpp with Rstudio Learing Rcpp Some quick reference guide Rcpp Quick Reference
